name: Baldi’s highschool
description:
It took an hour so here it is

Welcome to Baldi’s highschool. But I WARNED you that this is a horror game 

Farewell this will have major updates,instead, I have to make a Baldi’s highschool series so it will go on. Also I am a 8 year old boy but I will be turning 9 soon.

Another fan game of Baldi’s Basics

A lot of people have been making Baldi’s Basics fan games so I have to make this

Not to be copied from Alex basics

But I don’t steal games I used the Baldi vectors to make the game I have to go do other stuff lol

Credit to all (except nikplaytv)RulesDo not steal this gameDo not mod this game
